original_text: The tribe of Benjamin will be on the other side of Ephraim's camp. The leader of the tribe of Benjamin is Abidan, the son of Gideoni.
korean_text: 또 베냐민 지파라 베냐민 자손의 지휘관은 기드오니의 아들 아비단이요

sentences.original_text: The tribe of Benjamin will be on the other side
sentences.korean_translation: 베냐민 지파는 다른 쪽에 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The leader of the tribe of Benjamin is Abidan
